CustomField.formula:
IF(AND( Downtime_Start_Month__c=4, Downtime_End_Month__c=4), Duration_s__c,
IF(AND( Downtime_Start_Month__c=4, Downtime_End_Month__c=5),
(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Downtime_Start_Date__c)))&"-04-30 22:00:00.000")-(Downtime_Start_Date__c))*86400,
IF(AND( Downtime_Start_Month__c=3, Downtime_End_Month__c=4),
((Downtime_End_Date__c)-DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Downtime_Start_Date__c)))&"-03-31 22:00:00.000"))*86400,
0)))
CustomField.label: Downtime (s) - April
